duties_responsibilities.duty: Obtain comprehensive admission history and perform physical assessment per unit policy.
Demonstrate ongoing assessment of patient’s psychosocial and educational process per unit policy.
Formulate an individualized nursing diagnosis and plan of care based on standards of care and practice.
Modify individualized plan of care based on ongoing assessment and changes in patient status.
Administer prescribed treatments and medications promptly according to hospital policies and procedures.
Document all aspects of the nursing process in a legible, concise, clear, and timely manner.
Involve patient and significant other(s) in all aspects of the nursing process and act as a patient advocate.
Demonstrate sound judgment with the Nursing Process based upon critical thinking skills and a problem-solving approach.
Perform other related duties as assigned.
